events.message: I recently received the product but I want to return it because it does not meet my expectations and I would like a full refund.
The reported issue has been categorized under refund as the customer requested a return and money back.
The case has been assigned to the refund specialist team to handle the return and refund process.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to return your purchase and get a refund. I’m here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can process the refund as quickly as possible?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product didn’t match the description on your website, so I no longer want it.
Thank you for the information. We can initiate your refund immediately after you send the item back using the prepaid return label we'll email you shortly.
Thank you for your prompt response and for providing a prepaid return label. I will send the item back as soon as I receive it.
We have confirmed receipt of your returned item and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure your refund was received and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
As you confirmed your refund was successful and no further assistance is needed, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
